author: Xbox
description:
Post-apocalyptic online vehicular combat game Crossout just received a “Forced Measure” major update that features an unlikely alliance of 2 factions: Engineers and Lunatics. This update brings brand new vehicle parts, including the new air cushion movement part, 2-mode machine gun, shotgun, crossbow and cabin. You're welcome to test these parts in the new "Test prototypes" brawl and, after that, dive into a new gameplay in the "Dangerous cargo" brawl!

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/crossout/c0fzngpnqqrq

author: Xbox
description:
The Xbox Full Screen Experience (FSE) is now available on Windows 11 handhelds currently in market and in preview for Windows 11 PCs - such as laptops, desktops and tablets.

For handhelds, FSE brings performance optimizations and the ability to boot directly into Xbox for a smoother, more seamless way to play - delivering a console-like experience designed to minimize friction and get players into their games faster.

And for PCs, the Xbox full screen experience introduces a controller-navigable UI that brings an immersive, console-like full-screen environment where players can easily browse and launch titles from across their game libraries- including the most popular PC storefronts. A powerful Task Switcher enables quick movement between games and apps, delivering a seamless experience.

Learn More: https://www.news.xbox.com 

SUBSCRIBE TO XBOX: https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR

title: Xbox Full Screen Experience comes to PC

author: Xbox
description:
Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora - From the Ashes, coming December 19, 2025. 
Preorder today: https://www.xbox.com/games/store/BIGID/9PMT40THK5X3 

Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora™ – From the Ashes is an action-adventure expansion with ties to the new Avatar: Fire and Ash film.

Experience the ultimate Pandora adventure in the Western Frontier, with new third-person gameplay offering revamped combat and improved banshee mechanics. Use stealth or go guns blazing to seek vengeance and redemption against the invaders.

author: Xbox
description:
Explore dungeons, grow stronger, and slay the dragon to become a hero!

Dragon Ruins II is now available for Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One and Windows devices! Get it from here: 

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/dragon-ruins-ii/9ND4Z3ZTBZBN

As an adventurer party based in the capital city of Isigwere, take on a wide range of quests—from small requests by townsfolk, like dealing with goblins, to the queen’s grand command to defeat the dragon that awakened in the underground ruins. Can you stop the world’s destruction and rise as the legendary hero?

- A dungeon crawler RPG where you grow stronger while exploring 15 dungeons.
- Choose 4 members from 21 classes such as Fighter and Ranger to form your party.
- Accept quests, hunt for treasure, and power up through auto battles.
- Make use of new equipment and skills to gain the upper hand in battle.
- Take on increasingly powerful foes and bosses in replayable runs.

© Graverobber Foundation
Published by KEMCO.
*Images are subject to change
title: Dragon Ruins II - Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One and PC - Official Trailer
